query.query: {"measures":[["avg","CallDurationInSeconds"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; a = group a by ('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day','CreatedDate__c_Hour');a = foreach a generate avg(avg('CallDurationInSeconds')) over([..] partition by all) as 'avg_CallDurationInSeconds';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["avg","CallDurationInSeconds",null,{"display":"Duration"}]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; a = group a by ('CreatedDate__c_Hour');a = foreach a generate  'CreatedDate__c_Hour' as 'CreatedDate__c_Hour', avg(CallDurationInSeconds) as 'avg_CallDurationInSeconds';","autoFilter":true,"groups":[["CreatedDate__c_Hour"]]}

{"measures":[["avg","Call_Per_Day"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};a = group a by ('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day');a = foreach a generate sum(count()) over([..] partition by all) / count() over ([..] partition by all) as 'avg_Call_Per_Day';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["avg","Agent_Occupancy",null,{"display":"Occupancy"}]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};a = group a by ('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day','CreatedDate__c_Hour');a = foreach a generate 'CreatedDate__c_Hour' as 'CreatedDate__c_Hour', (sum('CallDurationInSeconds')/ ( 36 * unique('Owner.Id'))) as 'sum_duration_Per_Agent';a = group a by 'CreatedDate__c_Hour';a = foreach a generate 'CreatedDate__c_Hour' as 'CreatedDate__c_Hour', avg('sum_duration_Per_Agent') as 'avg_Agent_Occupancy';","autoFilter":true,"groups":[["CreatedDate__c_Hour"]]}

values: {"display":"MTD","value":[{"Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 60 days\"..\"current day - 1 month\"]","BacklogCompare":"[\"current day - 1 month\"..\"current day\"]","CoGroup":"('CreatedDate__c_Week')","Compact":[["month",0],["month",0]],"Current":"[\"current month\"..\"current month\"]","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Month'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCoGroupDate2":"'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCreatedDate__c":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')","GroupbyCreatedDate__c":"('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cTask":"('TaskSubtype','CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cEvent":"('EventSubtype','CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","Grouping":"CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day","LastPeriodCompare":"[\"7 days ago - 1 week\"..\"current day - 1 week\"]","LastYearCompare":"[\"7 days ago - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]","GroupbyCreatedDate__cMetric":"('CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day')","compactGroup":["CreatedDate__c_Year","CreatedDate__c_Month","CreatedDate__c_Day"],"filter":"month","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Week'] as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Week'"}]}

{"display":"Last 7 Days","value":[{"Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 37 days\"..\"current day - 7 days\"]","BacklogCompare":"[\"current day - 1 week\"..\"current day\"]","CoGroup":"('CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","Compact":[["day",-7],["month",0]],"Current":"[\"7 days ago\"..\"current day\"]","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Month'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCoGroupDate2":"'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCreatedDate__c":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')","GroupbyCreatedDate__c":"('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cTask":"('TaskSubtype','CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cEvent":"('EventSubtype','CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","Grouping":"CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day","LastPeriodCompare":"[\"7 days ago - 1 week\"..\"current day - 1 week\"]","LastYearCompare":"[\"7 days ago - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]","GroupbyCreatedDate__cMetric":"('CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day')","compactGroup":["CreatedDate__c_Year","CreatedDate__c_Month","CreatedDate__c_Day"],"filter":"week","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Month']+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Day'] as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'"}]}

{"display":"Last 30 Days","value":[{"Backlog30DayClose":"[\"current day - 240 days\"..\"current day - 180 days\"]","BacklogCompare":"[\"current day - 180 days\"..\"current day\"]","CoGroup":"('CreatedDate__c_Month')","Compact":[["day",-30],["day",0]],"Current":"[\"30 days ago\"..\"current day\"]","GenerateClosedDate":"'ClosedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'ClosedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month'\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCoGroupDate2":"'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCreatedDate__c":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GroupbyClosedDate":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month')","GroupbyCreatedDate__c":"('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cTask":"('TaskSubtype','CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cEvent":"('EventSubtype','CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month')","Grouping":"CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month","LastPeriodCompare":"[\"180 days ago - 180 days\"..\"current day - 180 days\"]","LastYearCompare":"[\"180 days ago - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]","GroupbyCreatedDate__cMetric":"('CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day')","compactGroup":["CreatedDate__c_Year","CreatedDate__c_Month","CreatedDate__c_Day"],"filter":"month","queryCogroupNew":"first(ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Year'])+\"~~~\"+ThisYear['CreatedDate__c_Month'] as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month'"}]}

{"display":"Last 60 Days","value":[{"Current":"[\"60 days ago\"..\"current day\"]","GenerateCoGroupDate":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month'\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCoGroupDate2":"'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GenerateCreatedDate__c":"'CreatedDate__c_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Month'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate__c_Day' as 'CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day'","GroupbyCreatedDate__c":"('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day')","GroupbyCreatedDate__cMetric":"('CreatedDate__c_Year~~~CreatedDate__c_Month~~~CreatedDate__c_Day')","Compact":[["day",-60],["day",0]],"compactGroup":["CreatedDate__c_Year","CreatedDate__c_Month","CreatedDate__c_Day"]}]}

query.query: {"measures":[["avg","Agent_Occupancy"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};a = group a by ('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day','CreatedDate__c_Hour');a = foreach a generate 'CreatedDate__c_Hour' as 'CreatedDate__c_Hour', (sum('CallDurationInSeconds')/ ( 36 * unique('Owner.Id'))) as 'sum_duration_Per_Agent';a = group a by 'CreatedDate__c_Hour';a = foreach a generate 'CreatedDate__c_Hour' as 'CreatedDate__c_Hour', avg('sum_duration_Per_Agent') as 'avg_Agent_Occupancy';a = group a by all;a = foreach a generate avg('avg_Agent_Occupancy') as 'avg_Agent_Occupancy';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":["{{(value(field(selection(metric_toggle), 'compactGroup')))}}"],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; a = group a by 'CreatedDate__c_Hour';a = foreach a generate 'CreatedDate__c_Hour' as 'CreatedDate__c_Hour', {{no_quote(value(field(selection(metric_toggle), 'Metric')))}} ;","autoFilter":true,"groups":[["CreatedDate__c_Hour"]]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; a = group a by 'Owner.Name';a = foreach a generate avg('CallDurationInSeconds') as 'avg_CallDurationInSeconds', unique('Case.Id') as 'sum_CaseId', 'Owner.Name' as 'Owner.Name', count() / unique('Case.Id') as 'avg_Calls_Per_Case';","measures":[["avg","CallDurationInSeconds",null,{"display":"Avg of Call Duration (Sec)"}],["avg","Calls_Per_Case",null,{"display":"Avg of Calls Per Case"}],["sum","CaseId__c",null,{"display":"Number of Cases"}]],"autoFilter":true,"groups":["Owner.Name"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; q = filter q by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; q = group q by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__c')))}};q = foreach q generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCreatedDate__c')))}}, unique('Id') as 'dailyCalls',avg(unique('Id')) over ([..] partition by all ) as 'avg_dailyCalls',sum(1) over ([..] partition by all) as 'Counter';q = group q by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__cMetric')))}};q = foreach q generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCoGroupDate2')))}}, power(first('dailyCalls') - (first('avg_dailyCalls')),2)/first('Counter') as 'sqr_diff_dailyCalls',first('avg_dailyCalls') as 'avg_dailyCalls',first('dailyCalls') as 'dailyCalls';q = group q by {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GroupbyCreatedDate__cMetric')))}};q = foreach q generate {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'GenerateCoGroupDate2')))}}, first('dailyCalls') as 'total_dailyCalls', first('avg_dailyCalls') as 'avg_dailyCalls',first('avg_dailyCalls') + (3 * sqrt(sum(sum('sqr_diff_dailyCalls')) over ([..] partition by all))) as 'l_UCL',first('avg_dailyCalls') - (3 * sqrt(sum(sum('sqr_diff_dailyCalls')) over ([..] partition by all))) as 'l_LCL';","measures":[["total","dailyCalls",null,{"display":"Daily Calls"}],["avg","dailyCalls",null,{"display":"Average"}],["l","UCL",null,{"display":"UCL"}],["l","LCL",null,{"display":"LCL"}]],"autoFilter":true,"groups":["{{(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'compactGroup')))}}"]}

{"measures":[["avg","CallsPerCase"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\"; a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};a = group a by all;a = foreach a generate count() / unique('Case.Id') as 'avg_CallsPerCase';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["sum","TotalCalls"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; a = group a by 'CreatedDate__c_Hour';a = foreach a generate  'CreatedDate__c_Hour' as 'CreatedDate__c_Hour', count() as 'sum_TotalCalls';","autoFilter":true,"groups":[["CreatedDate__c_Hour"]]}

{"measures":[["avg","Call_Per_Hour"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; a = group a by ('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day');a = foreach a generate count() / ( unique('CreatedDate__c_Hour') *  unique('CreatedDate__c_Day'))  as 'avg_Call_Per_Hour';","autoFilter":true}

{"measures":[["avg","Call_Per_Agent"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";a = filter a by date('CreatedDate__c_Year', 'CreatedDate__c_Month', 'CreatedDate__c_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}}; a = group a by ('CreatedDate__c_Year','CreatedDate__c_Month','CreatedDate__c_Day');a = foreach a generate count() / unique('Owner.Name') as 'avg_Call_Per_Agent';a = group a by all;a = foreach a generate avg('avg_Call_Per_Agent')  as 'avg_Call_Per_Agent';","autoFilter":true}
